name: api_ui_Canvas
description: Element that can be used for screen rendering.

properties.name: additionalShaderChannels
properties.description: Get or set the mask of additional shader channels to be used when creating the Canvas mesh.

properties.name: cachedSortingLayerValue
properties.description: Cached calculated value based upon SortingLayerID.

properties.name: isRootCanvas
properties.description: Is this the root Canvas?

properties.name: normalizedSortingGridSize
properties.description: The normalized grid size that the canvas will split the renderable area into.

properties.name: overridePixelPerfect
properties.description: Allows for nested canvases to override pixelPerfect settings inherited from parent canvases.

properties.name: overrideSorting
properties.description: Allows for nested canvases to override the Canvas.sortingOrder from parent canvases.

properties.name: pixelPerfect
properties.description: Forces pixel alignment for elements in the canvas. It only applies when Canvas.renderMode is set to Screen Space.

properties.name: pixelRect
properties.description: Get the render rect for the Canvas.

properties.name: planeDistance
properties.description: How far away from the camera is the Canvas generated? It only applies when Canvas.renderMode is set to RenderMode.ScreenSpaceCamera.

properties.name: referencePixelsPerUnit
properties.description: The number of pixels per unit that is considered the default.

properties.name: renderingDisplaySize
properties.description: Provides the pixel dimensions of the display area where the UI canvas is rendered.

properties.name: renderMode
properties.description: Is the Canvas in World or Overlay mode?

properties.name: renderOrder
properties.description: The render order in which the canvas is being emitted to the Scene. (Read Only)

properties.name: rootCanvas
properties.description: Returns the Canvas closest to root, by checking through each parent and returning the last canvas found. If no other canvas is found then the canvas will return itself.

properties.name: scaleFactor
properties.description: Scales the entire canvas, ensuring it fits the screen. It only applies when Canvas.renderMode is set to Screen Space.

properties.name: sortingLayerID
properties.description: Unique ID of the Canvas' sorting layer.

properties.name: sortingLayerName
properties.description: Name of the Canvas' sorting layer.

properties.name: sortingOrder
properties.description: Canvas' order within a sorting layer.

properties.name: targetDisplay
properties.description: For Overlay mode, display index on which the UI canvas will appear.

properties.name: updateRectTransformForStandalone
properties.description: Should the Canvas size be updated based on the render target when a manual Camera.Render call is performed.
